version_description:
Mushroom Wars 2, the most awesome game of the popular real-time strategy series yet!
In this latest game you will find:
* 4 thrilling storyline campaign episodes
* 8 courageous hero characters with unique skills
* advanced multiplayer
* thousands of Mushrooms!

Updates:
* stability improved
* working round the clock to make the game even better!

Celebrating Chinese New Year!

* This update wraps up multiplayer Season 1 and starts Season 2.
* All the players' ratings are reset, so now everyone has an equal chance to become a top player!
* Medals for Season 1 achievements are awarded!
* Enjoy winter skins and levels!
* Stay tuned for a special discount to celebrate Chinese New Year!
* You now have an ability to restore War Spirits for free!
* As always, we've added more stability improvements

- Stream the game right to Periscope or Mobcrush!
- Choose avatar frame for your profile
- Thanks to links to social networks added to your profile, it is now easier for other players to find you
-
Сrashes in multiplayer fixed

- Ability to save and share videos in Replays added
- Ability to skip intro-video added
- Bug, leading to crash after simultaneous application of hero's skills, fixed
- Dozens of minor improvements

Skills balance updates:


Marty'O
- Spy: not only shows the amount of units in the building, but also slows down units production by 25%
- Fog of War: opposing units move 30% slower under the Fog of War

Trini
- Illusion skill left the hero charater to be replaced by Flight. It allows units to move from building to building really fast
- Units under the impact of the Ring of Frost skill now unfreeze gradually, not all at once

Stella
- Units production for level 5 villages is decreased for Speed up Production skill

Cree
- Invisibility - invisible units are not detected by towers
- Reverse is active for 3 seconds, opposing units will turn around once they reach the skill's effective range

Pahom
- Skill Home is now moved to slot 3
- Resurrection is now in slot 2, Pahom can now restore 50% of units who deceased in the latest attack
Bug fixes and stability improvements.

* Royal Pack owners are welcome to vote for future game features! More info in game news.
* Stella's balance is changed:
1. First skill, speed up production, is fixed. Now it accelerates production twice, not 3 times.
2. Break the Spells skills is changed to Silence - be sure to check it out!
* tvOS version is now brought into sync with iOS version
* Other bug fixes and improvements

Fixed friends list.
Fixed offline mode.
Fixed incorrect campaign stars count.

Epic EPISODE 2 update is here!
New content includes:
* 50+ Campaign maps with new features
* 30+ Multiplayer maps
* 4 Heroes
and brand new Multiplayer Progression System!

Various bug fixes to recent epic EPISODE 2 update!

New content includes:
* 50+ Campaign maps with new features
* 30+ Multiplayer maps
* 4 Heroes
and brand new Multiplayer Progression System!

Brand new in-game tutorial for all newcomers.
Also a tons of minor fixes including 3 and 4 players battles back in multiplayer.
Hot fix to address a number of recent issues including Cree's not working 1st ability and connection problems.

We made some changes in multiplayer to give our players more reason to play for different heroes.

Balance was tuned for these heroes:
RUDO
"Sabotage" - amount of attacking units is increased.

CREE
"Invisibility" - duration time is increased.

TRINI
"Beehive" - units speed is increased.

KENOR
"Close Ranks" - units speed is increased.
"Bomb" - damage increased and units outside the building are not effected.

ZIK
"Chain Reaction" - maximum amount of units being killed is decreased.

Also as usual there are some more minor fixes and improvements.

Hot fixes to the recent update including performance and stability enhancements.
Sorry for the inconvenience.
We are working on further updates now and of course we take in account your recent feedback. Thank you for playing our game.
Minor stability improvements.

* We devided multiplayer into 2 modes: Ranked 1v1 and unranked Arcade
.
* Now cards drop only for unlocked heroes so you can upgrade your existing heroes faster.
* We increased souls drop so you are be able to unlock new heroes faster.
* Roulette was upgraded with many more valuable prizes.
* Cost of skill charges was dramatically decreased. We hope that along with other changes it will stimulate using more different heroes.
* Some known bugs and issues were fixed.
Compatibility and stability improvements.

Fixed connectivity issues that sometimes caused "endless multiplayer matches" problem.
Added support of recently released devices.
Other stability and performance improvements.

Participate in Christmas Event and unlock unique hero Sato'Shii!

Stay tuned for the next update.

Improved iPhone X compatibility.
Bug fixes and stability improvements.
Minor bugfixes regarding multiplayer stability.
Minor stability improvements and in-game analitycs fixes.

Stay tuned for the next update.

This update brings you new changes to the game including

- Able to change settings for in-match menu through ”long-tap” feature

- Able to see defense, attack and unit movement speed with a Percentage bar, activate by tap on icon next to your avatar

- Able to turn on and off gameplay tips. Things such as skill description and forge or moral related info

- Significant increase of download speed of the game on all platforms. Which could potentially create some game bugs, if experienced please make sure to inform us

- Added improvement hints to loser screen

- Hero Cards has been altered to be more suitable for which kinds you need.

The most recent update was not the best one so far, and sure enough, you've told us plenty of times!
This new update that we're bringing is a hotfix for everything that went wrong, we're at least hoping for it!
It will fix some minor issues with unsynchronized matchmaking. It will also reduce the amount of connection issues and improve situations with crashes and bugs!
Hopefully by the next update, the one after this, everything should be back to normal and even better! That one will be fully dedicated to fix bugs!

Happy New Year and have a wonderful Updated Game!
V2.8.1 brings new features and fixes

* Opportunity to increase speed of viewing Match Replay has been added! (up to x4)
* Daily rewards push-notifications has been added!
* Energy-rush visualization reworked!

* Previous older issue of starting Game Maps fixed!
* Domination and King of the Hill buildings visualization fixed!
* Replay record "Rec" button which didn't work has been removed!

We bring you the new 2.7.0 update today with new features!

- Charges can now be refreshed by both ad view as well as by gems
- Notification “Charges are about to run out” has been removed
- Maps preview are now in a better quality
- Performance was increased and improved

Bugs
- Radius of skill usage has changed back to normal size again. There were bugs with a small radius version.
- Visualization problems have been fixed. For example capturing buildings, blinking maps, custom games and so on
- Bug with vanished payments was fixed
- Bug with iOS push-notifications was fixed

Hopefully this will be a playable update and if there are any issues, don’t be afraid to always spam us everywhere!

HOTFIX for crashes.

It is time for yet another update and it’s details! Hopefully this can finally make you all happy!
- We fixed the weird memory leak optimization that one of you kept complaining about! The game shouldn’t crash anymore for you!
- We also optimized the game for all of the rich IPhone X, Xs, Xr and Xs Max users! Every year we have to optimize for new devices…
- We finally added the option of Push notifications for when the chests are ready to open with fancy iOS 12 design. Now you can get your rewards faster!
- Lastly we made HUGE changes to A LOT of maps and heroes in this update. We have tried to balance them out as much as possible. But honestly there are too many to name here. Like 8 maps change and 14 ability change! We will tell on discord. Maybe!

Good luck Generals and please enjoy, see you on the battlefield! For any feedback or comments please contact us. You always do, nothing stops you!

The Limited Time Hero Sato’Shii will be available once again for everyone to win until 28th February.

Hopefully the game should be more playable again. We have solved some of the bugs and issues.

Episode 3: Red & Furious

Epic Mushrooms journey continues!
* 50 new story-driven campaign missions with boss fights

Girls' power!

* Fixed missing sounds after the first game.
* Fixed infinite duration of certain skills: "Plague" (Ankh), "Freeze Building" (Trini), etc.
* Fixed special zones (fire, ice, slowdown) not working on some maps.
* Fixed incorrect behavior of "Skill Steal" (Mooro) skill when opponents rapidly use their skills.
* Fixed incorrect duration of "Defensive Walls" (Rudo) skill.
* Fixed incorrect volume of sound effects of new skills.

Balance changes for "Unholy Attack" (Mouro)
* Max number of skeletons reduced from 40 to 24 (16/18/20/22/24 level-wise).
* Now doesn't affect neutral buildings.
* Now doesn't affect level 5 villages.

* Added unlock of certain heroes with the purchase of episodes: Pahom – for Episode 2, Stella – for Episode 3.
* Fixed desynchronization when using "Exchange" (Klotz) and "UFO" (Pix-O).
* Fixed missing attack enhancement when using "Totem of Rage" (Chia).
* Fixed incorrect sounds and music on new multiplayer maps.
* Fixed various missing sounds.
* Fixed incorrect emotion sounds for Wilford and Pix-O.
* Fixed slowdown when playing on new maps with fire.
* Fixed missing localization for "Qualification" text.
* Fixed coin animation when switching heroes.

* Improved Stella's video.
* Fixed excessively high attack coefficient when having forges.
* Fixed desynchronization when using "Invisibility" (Cree) and building a forge.
* Fixed missing defense augmentation for allied buildings when using "Totem of Rage" (Chia).
* Fixed missing tornado sound on Episode 3 mission 13.

+ New group of special offers.
* Fixed white squares shown instead of avatars.
* Fixed invisible obstacles on maps I-21, II-7 and II-35.

Good Day, Fellow Updated Warriors!
Today we bring the fully loaded update of V3.3.0 and with it of course come a huge list of added features, balances and fixed bugs as usual. Hope we managed to cover and fix most of what you’ve asked for! And Yes, Pix-O is finally nerfed!

For the full list of new Features, Added Balances and Fixed Bugs with detail, please join our Discord!

* Fixed missing XP panel.
* Fixed level-up screen not displaying.
* Fixed incorrect resource values on level-up screen.
* Fixed "Open time" localization.
* Reduced number of crashes on devices with 1 GB RAM.

Generals, we have an anniversary!
The Mushroom Wars universe is 10 years old! We invite you to celebrate with us! We have prepared the first legendary in-game event for you: "Rudomania", with new mechanics and an ocean of gifts. Get gold, chests, unique skins for all heroes, and the main prize: a legendary skin for Rudo!
